attributes.action: elliminate tuition fees and reinstate government grants
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Graduating students are leaving university in heavy debt, not only should the government elliminate tuition fees, the government should offer grants to pay for living cost. Also the loan system should not be based upon how much someones parents earn but should be a set figure which gives the student enough to live on.

rejection.details:
There is a very similar petition:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/scrapfees/
Please resubmit if you would prefer your own.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
